rides.name: Bucking Bronco
rides.description: Hold on tight as you ride the wild bucking bronco through the dusty plains!

rides.name: Stampede Express
rides.description: Join the stampede aboard the fastest train in the West!

rides.name: Tumbleweed Twister
rides.description: Spin and swirl through the desert winds on this wild tumbleweed adventure!

rides.name: Cactus Coaster
rides.description: Zoom through the desert landscape on this thrilling cactus-themed roller coaster!

rides.name: Gold Rush Rapids
rides.description: Hang on as you navigate the treacherous rapids of the gold rush river!

rides.name: Wild West Whirl
rides.description: Twist and turn through the old western town on this exciting spinning ride!

rides.name: Prairie Plunge
rides.description: Take the plunge down the tallest drop in the prairie on this thrilling water ride!

rides.name: Saloon Swing
rides.description: Swing high and low on this classic saloon-themed swing ride!

rides.name: Desert Dune Buggies
rides.description: Race through the sandy dunes in your very own desert dune buggy!

rides.name: Rattlesnake Run
rides.description: Slither and slide through the twists and turns of the rattlesnake-infested canyon!
